msg: Checkin For Trevor: Enhancements to the XAP Widget Tests.

author: jdillon
msg: Cleaned up dependencyManagement, removed duplicate definitions, removed stax:stax-api 1.0 (leaving 1.0.1)
Removed incubator repo, picked up from genesis 1.1

author: tellison
msg: Apply patch HARMONY-2930 ([classlib][luni]java.net.Socket cann't bind the local address when constructed with proxy)

author: ab
msg: Upgrade to Hadoop 0.10.1. HTTPClient is now a dependency - move it
to lib/ and remove it as a plugin.
Add also native Linux libraries for Hadoop compression, plus corresponding
Hadoop uses larger buffers now - explicitly set large heap size for
JUnit tests. All tests should pass now.
